snippet: Asafa Powell will meet Usain Bolt in the 100 meters at the Diamond League meet in Oslo in June, in a possible preview of a marquee race at the Olympics
abstract: Champion sprinters Asafa Powell and Usain Bolt will duel in the 100 meters at the Diamond League meet in Oslo, in a possible preview of a marquee race at the 2012 Olympics
lead_paragraph: Asafa Powell will meet Usain Bolt in the 100 meters at the Diamond League meet in Oslo in June, in a possible preview of a marquee race at the Olympics
